title: Inkay

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Spend the night to gain the Abilities, Attributes and Pokemon Ability of a Pokemon role of your choice. You cannot evolve from Base to Evolved.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask abilities from different copied roles, except when using your original ability.
- Kills you make show up as having been caused by the role you copied.
- Inkay is almost pronounced like NK.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: **Contrary** - Roleblocks, redirects or other negative effects do not affect you and instead increase your attack and defence tiers by one for the night.

desc:
Post 2465
*It draws prey near with its blinking lights and then wraps them up in its long tentacles and holds them in place.*
